isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - INSTALL - INNER DOOR HANDLE

svcsubproc.title: Install Driver Side Inner Door Handle
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 55 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: If inner door handle (Item 3) was replaced, install inner door handle control rod (Item 2) into inner door handle and slide retaining clip (Item 1) over inner door handle control rod to secure it.

Position inner door handle (Item 3) and inner door handle control rod (Item 2) through opening in upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly (Item 6). Position inner door handle mounting bracket (Item 5) on back side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly and install two hex nuts and washers (Item 4) onto threaded studs and tighten.

Install upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly onto cab door. Refer to
UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY
, Install Driver Side Upper Door Trim/Inner Door Panel and Window Regulator Assembly.

Install cab door lower trim panel onto cab door. Refer to
CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL
, Install Driver Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel.

svcsubproc.title: Install Passenger Side Inner Door Handle
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 56 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: If inner door handle (Item 3) was replaced, install inner door handle control rod (Item 2) into inner door handle and slide retaining clip (Item 1) over inner door handle control rod to secure it.

Position inner door handle (Item 3) and inner door handle control rod (Item 2) through opening in upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly (Item 6). Position inner door handle mounting bracket (Item 5) on back side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly and install two hex nuts and washers (Item 4) onto threaded studs and tighten.

Install upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly onto cab door. Refer to
UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY
, Install Passenger Side Upper Door Trim/Inner Door Panel and Window Regulator Assembly.

Install cab door lower trim panel onto cab door. Refer to
CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL
, Install Passenger Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel.
